A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
It wasn't bad\, but it sure was not good.
A bit slow at times: some aspects of the plot and characters didn't quite flow as they could have.
Still\, lots of great action\, emotionally satisfying scenes and well acted characters (that could be given some more space though).
A really good Star Wars movie\, more original (but not as original as some think) than Force Awakens with better action.
Could have lost a couple pounds in the edit.
